items.preText: Thakur: "What is the weather forecast ? Any chance of Rain ?" -- Right now, nope! Meanwhile, in the middle the slips have been taken out, and instead New Zealand have a catching short extra and a short midwicket
items.text: full, straight, and it squirts off the inside edge of a thrusting bat, the ball bouncing down to fine leg for a couple
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

items.preText: Will we see some variations of pace now, with two catchers on the drive?
items.text: gun barrel straight, down the ground! Henry did pitch it up, inviting the drive, but Soumya slugs it straight back over his head for four
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.preText: Naseef: "It's Eid here in Bangladesh so I'd like to wish everyone associated with this game Eid Mubarak and all the best!! As for the match, I hope my team wins but beyond that I hope this match turns out to be an exciting affair and we end up on the right side of the result!! Right now, I hope everyone is enjoying it!!"
items.text: Soumya steps into a fluid drive, but Taylor is at short extra and stops it cleanly
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: and now it's Santner who stops a thrashing shot in the off side field - at backward point this time, Soumya having gone at it off the back foot
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Shorif Uddin : "Vinod Rajpal, one smartphone is using for watching live, and the other one is using for cricinfo live commentary. Without cricinfo live commentary, the cricket match is for me like 'dish without salt!' "
items.text: edged, but there are no slips! Third man scoots around to keep them to one. It was a cutter from Henry, and just nipped away from the bat a touch
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Boult continues. He still has one wide slip
items.text: too straight, and it's nudged off the hip for a single
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Anns Mahboob: "Is the myth correct that the ESPN cricinfo commentators are planning a coup to replace the ICC commentators at the world cup?" -- Rumbled!
items.text: crack! Tamim rocks back and hammers this pull, but de Grandhomme is in exactly the right spot at midwicket to stop it
items.shortText: Boult to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: From the ESPNcricinfo stats team: Boult has had Tamim's number in ODIs - 29 runs for 2 dismissals in 57 balls - but Soumya Sarkar has handled him very well, scoring 45 from 49 balls without being dismissed
items.text: outside off, and Tamim holds his bat inside the line to let the ball through
items.shortText: Boult to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: Tamim is forward this time, driving smartly but straight at mid off
items.shortText: Boult to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: smell that! Boult pushes Tamim back into his crease with a bristling bouncer, successfully evaded
items.shortText: Boult to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: this one was headed down the leg side, but Boult gets away with it as Tamim can't get a good connection on his leg glance. Just the one
items.shortText: Boult to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Henry continues. The run rate is only four - but New Zealand haven't been able to break through
items.text: Tamim steps into a drive, and mid on is deep so there's a quick single to be had
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: AA Musabbir: "Real test of patience, temperment, technic, tactics everything for Bangladesh against a strong bowling of newzealand in a cloudy afternoon in England. this is when just Bangladesh need to prove people that this team is strong underdogs or serious contenders.perfect time for Bangladesh to roar.brave and early call!! Good start!! trademark Soumya with picture perfect straight drive. Sign of audacity. Make a gift of Eid."
items.text: thrashed through extra! Henry aims full, and just wide enough to draw a flowing drive from Soumya. The ball flies in the air, but in the gap. And it was travelling!
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: Henry pulls his length back a shade, Soumya angling his blade for a single to gully
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: and Tamim follows suit, an angled bat sending the ball bouncing down to third man
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Joynul: "@shorif, i Concur that. Without cricinfo, its like Avengers movie, without all that other Marvel movie. That would make no senses"
items.text: thundered through the off side! When he spots width, Soumya swings his bat like a battle axe. He gives everything to this forcing stroke through cover, and collects four
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: Henry adjusts, aiming straighter, and he's nurdled to leg for one
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Boult continues. That wide slip remains in place
items.text: Soumya stretches forward to poke a drive to point
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Rahul Pagaria: "I'm more interested in this match compared to Ind vs SA. These are two young teams who will fight not just for points, but to make a mark on the world cricket and to show others to take them seriously. Something tells me that if NZ wins this match, they will be unstoppable."
items.text: a sliding stop saves runs! Boult offered up a freebie, headed down the leg side, and Soumya happily helped it on its way. It looked like four all the way, but de Grandhomme makes excellent ground at fine leg, putting in a dive to cut it off and saving two runs
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

items.text: angled down to third man, and he turns the strike over
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Arjun Devgan: "Wanted to ask. What do new Zealand need to actually win a tournament like this? Since they tend to reach the last-four A player like virat kohli or someone who gives them the edge a la Andre Russel? " Always the bridesmaid, never the bride, ey. A bit of self belief would go a long way
items.text: tapped to cover, but there's no way through the field
items.shortText: Boult to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: handsomely pulled! Boult tests him with a short one, but Tamim gets into a great position, maintains his balance, and hammers it away
items.shortText: Boult to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.preText: Tasmeem: "How many shots have gone straight to the hands I wonder? Need to find the gaps more."
items.text: good comeback from the bowler, zoning in on off stump with a bit of wobble. Tamim does enough to keep it out, if a little awkwardly
items.shortText: Boult to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a good length, and Tamim hops to ride the bounce and guide a single to third man
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Mustafa Moudi: "@Shorif: There are many dishes which taste really good even Without salt.... For me Cricket match without Cricinfo Commentary is like Smartphone Without Internet, just used for Calling and Checking time !!"
items.text: angled across Soumya, who looks for a glide to third man himself, but picks out gully
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, no run
